MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 12:36 pm in the L36 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting customers in Gentwood Road and surrounding streets, following reports of a banging underground cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and and as safely as possible, due to the complexity of work required we now expect the power to be restored by 10 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:55 pm on 12th October, 2020.
